snippet: Drew Brees threw two touchdown passes, extending his N.F.L. record streak to 51 games, to lead the Saints to a much-needed win over the Eagles on Monday night.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New Orleans Saints defeat Philadelphia Eagles, 28-13; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Drew Brees threw two touchdown passes, extending his N.F.L. record streak to 51 games, to lead the Saints to a much-needed win over the Eagles on Monday night.

headline.seo: Eagles’ Streak of Defeats Reaches Four
headline.main: Eagles’ Streak of Defeats Reaches Four
headline.print_headline: Eagles’ Streak Of Defeats Reaches Four
